text: Japan national volleyball team is the national volleyball team of Japan. Japan won a team Gold medal in the Olympics 1972. They've won Gold medals seven times in Asian Volleyball Championships. Their head coach is Masashi Nanbu. == Honors == * Olympic: Gold medal (1972) - Silver Medal (1986) * World Cup Silver medal: (1969 - 1977) * Asian Championship: Gold medal (1975, 1983, 1987, 1991, 1995, 2005, 2009) * Asian Games: Gold medal (2010, 1994, 1982, 1974, 1970, 1966, 1958) == References == == Other websites == * JPN Vollyball - JVA Category:National volleyball teams Category:National sports teams of Japan
title: Japan men's national volleyball team
